Package com.wolvencraft.yasp.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BookUtil  
    ConfirmationTimer
    A simple timed task that checks if the specified session's player is still online
    Message
    Utility class used for sending different types of messages to players.
    SimplePotionEffect
    Simple class intended to temporarily store basic information about a potion effect
    StatsSignFactory
    Handles all StatsSign functionality.
    TPSTracker
    Measures the tick rate of the server.
    There can only be one instance of this method running in the plugin.
    Util
    Utility class containing assorted methods that do not fit other categories
